Reviews.Title: “Excellent staff,great lication”
Reviews.Author: naddo
Reviews.Content: We booked a 2bedroom superior suite only to find out that they were over booked with that type, and couldnt give us the room.The matter was quickly resolved in a professional matter by the manager stepping in and showing us 2(one bedroom suites) and adding free breakfasts during the stay as a (much appreciated) sorry.2 of our kids were teens so we agreed to the new arrangement,but if it was a family with young children I guess it would be a big downer.The suites are well maintained,with a stove,washing machine,plates and pots.kettle and fridge/freezer. I was very impressed by the housekeeping department,my requests (like a baby cot,assistance with washer) were answered within minutes! Great location right in front of Deira city center where u can grab a bite,watch a few movies and shop in carrefore.The thing I disliked was the old box-type TV in the bedroom,although there was a 32plasma in the living room,also the toiletries were too basic,I would've expected at least a tooth brush and shaving kit added to the shampoo/gel/cream/soap in the toilets.

Reviews.Title: “it was neglected”
Reviews.Author: peyman46
Reviews.Content: a good hotel with poor manage make a very good opportunity to naught . excellent position can make this hotel unique .but poor maintenance decrease the quality of this hotel. the swiming pool was very beautiful but the water tempreture was very cold that made this pool impossible to swin . of course they gave us transportation to another city season but it was very uncomfortable to wait 45 min for a car to swiming pool and then 45 min waiting for a car to get back to suits. the breakfast was not excitable as a 4 stars hotels breakfasts. at arrival they asked 1050 ADE for excess bed . after that I knew this fact that " up to 2 children under 12 years are free " they gave back this money to me . what if I didn't know this fact by internet site????? one undeniable fact is the closest distanc to deira city center and it is a very good plus

Reviews.Title: “Almost perfect!”
Reviews.Author: liliya_nebes
Reviews.Content: Almost everything was perfect: big room (family deluxe for 4) will all kitchen facilities working (teapot,microwave,washing machine) and good service, impressive lobby, big elevators, good staff, complimentary water, tea and coffee... Outdoor swimming pool and jacuzzi were great, also there were sauna and gym though we haven'tr used them. Highly recommended. They have wired internet connection free of charge but should have WiFi because it's a big problem to connect for ipads and other wireless things (WiFi provided only in lobby). Bathrobe and slippers provided were only for 1 person though the room was for 4 ppl.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and very helpfull staff and managers.”
Reviews.Author: Suzaneieiphyu
Reviews.Content: Fantastic staff and helpful managers,we felt like our second home.the service was excellent and rooms very clean, I recommend friends visiting Dubai to try the suites.

Reviews.Title: “very good location”
Reviews.Author: raja s
Reviews.Content: staff are very good and service room was clean and comfort

Reviews.Title: “Surprise unexpected excellent service”
Reviews.Author: real55555
Reviews.Content: Lovely, sweet and unexpected excellent service that i received during my stay especially when my kids received Eid gifts. They were remarkably helpful & attentive.

Reviews.Title: “Good stay for one night”
Reviews.Author: Wesam316
Reviews.Content: we stayed there for one night .. and had Suhoor during Ramadan .. it was decently clean .. the bathroom though had some problems which didn't effect our stay as we were only there to stay the night .. however i felt that the hotel is understaffed as we checked in late night and we did find only 2 people a receptionist and a guy who carry the bags and no valley parking .. i guess this hotel could have been a much better place if there were more staff and maybe more lights .. cant complain though its a decent hotel

Reviews.Title: “comfortable”
Reviews.Author: shirinSanandaj
Reviews.Content: it was my 7 th trip to dubai, so i 've been in so many hotels . The location was excellent, and the employers was so kind. and there was so many employes that liked to serve you the best .

Reviews.Title: “Good for all”
Reviews.Author: samirt74
Reviews.Content: It is centrally located, good spaciousrooms with all amenities.

Reviews.Title: “Loved This Place!”
Reviews.Author: singhzz
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel to live. We had a 1 bed 2 bath huge room with a gr8 functional and nice kitchnen. The Deira mall and a movie theatre is just opposite the hotel so it was good for me to just cross and do my shopping and cook etc. with my 6 month old baby.The food is excellent though the menu is very limited. The quantity is good too. The hotel provided a good baby cot and play pen for her so she was happy and so were we. Overall, if you are a business traveller or are @ the hotel with family and babies, its gr8 to stay. We forgot our cellphones @ the hotel (Our baby slipped it below the couch) and the hotel was kind enough to send it back to our home country!!

Reviews.Title: “Poor Facilities, Poor Service, Very disappointed”
Reviews.Author: Eylem
Reviews.Content: I stayed this year in February at City Seasons in Dubai and was very disppointed. I knew it was in the business area of Dubai and far away from the beach, but hoped for a nice swimmingpool to chill out. They have a swimming pool but no sunshine, because it is build at the wrong side and there is no way that you will have any sun, except from 8 till 12 o'clock in the morning! great! Also the gym facility was very poor! Half or actually all of the machine did not work, except one of them and there was no one who actually looked after and explained anyting. The service at the reception and in overall was very disappointing and not helpful at all. The rooms are clean and tidy but the customer service and facilities are very poor. My opinion: Not worth the money!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: Globerocker
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the City Seasons,Dubai in December 2005 and it was a very pleasant stay.I had a one-bedroom apartment that was very neat & clean and extremely well designed as well.The hotel is about a 10 minute drive from the airport and is bang opposite the Deira City Centre Mall.The lobby is atrium style and though a little poorly lit, is quite impressive anyway.Breakfast at the cheerful lobby-level restaurant was very good in terms of quality and variety.I would certainly stay there again and would recommend it to business & leisure travellers.

Reviews.Title: “Very good Business Hotel in Dubai”
Reviews.Author: climatepolicy
Reviews.Content: I was very satisfied with my 2 room apartment. The interior is very well designed. It was a pleasure to stay there. Value for money! If you are a frequent traveller, ask for special corporate rates for regular usage. Room service was working also all right. Recommendable!

HotelInfo.Name: City Seasons Suites
HotelInfo.Address: 8th Street Port Saeed District | PO Box 56421, Dubai 182002, United Arab Emirates
